title: India to supply 110,000 tonne rice to Guinea-Bissau, Djibouti, Tanzania
description:
New Delhi: Despite existing export restrictions, India will send 110,000 tonne of rice to three African nations–Guinea-Bissau, Djibouti, and Tanzania–on humanitarian grounds, two senior officials aware of the development told Mint.

India had imposed ban on the export of certain rice varieties, incl...
